VIDEO: Brian Kettner Explains the Value of our New Research Control® Valve Positioners Chemical Processing magazine interviewed Brian Kettner, marketing manager, about our new Research Control® valve positioners. Brian explains how the valve positioners operate and the value they provide in applications requiring high-precision valve performance.
Did you know you can sell Hedland Flow Meters?
That's right! Hedland is an open distribution product line from Badger Meter. This means you don't have to be specifically contracted or authorized to sell Hedland flow meters and switches.
Hedland flow meters use variable area measurement technology to acheive reliable flow measurements of a variety of fluids, including liquids and compressed gases.

Come see us at AHR Expo New York City, January 21-23
We'll be exhibiting in booth #1058 at the AHR Expo - the world's largest HVACR marketplace. The show serves as a gathering place for 1,800 manufacturers and suppliers of the latest HVACR systems, equipment, products, and services.
Badger Meter offers a proven line of flow instruments designed to measure energy demand and resource usage for building systems. At AHR Expo, we will be displaying the following flow meter technology:
M-Series electromagnetic meters Clamp-on ultrasonic meters Portable ultrasonic meters Impeller Btu meters​

Vision Meters Receive NSF Approval
Vision turbine flow meters comply with NSF standards for their lead-free design and conform to the requirements of the U.S. Safe Drinking Water Act.
Designed for flow measurement of low-viscosity and non-aggressive liquids, Vision meters are suitable for flow applications in food and beverage environments.
